    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddToCartFacade
    AddToCartFacade is responsible for managing the process of adding products to the shopping cart.
    Application
    Application is the main entry point for the Spring Boot application.
    HelloWorldController
    HelloWorldController is a simple REST controller that handles HTTP requests to display a greeting message.
    InventoryService
    InventoryService manages the stock levels of products in the webshop.
    LoadProductDatabase
    LoadProductDatabase initializes the database with sample product data upon application startup.
    PriceCalculationService
    PriceCalculationService provides methods for calculating and rounding prices.
    Product
    Represents a product in the system with its attributes such as name, price, and type.
    ProductController
    ProductController manages requests related to product operations in the webshop.
    ProductDetailDTO
    ProductDetailDTO is a Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing detailed information about a product.
    ProductDetailFacade
    ProductDetailFacade provides methods to retrieve and manipulate detailed information about products.
    ProductRepository
    ProductRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing Product entities.
    ProductService
    ProductService provides methods to manage products in the webshop.
    ShoppingCart
    ShoppingCart represents a user's shopping cart containing selected products.
    ShoppingCartController
    ShoppingCartController manages requests related to shopping cart operations.
    ShoppingCartService
    ShoppingCartService manages the shopping cart operations, including adding products, retrieving the current cart, and calculating total prices.
    User
    User represents an individual user within the webshop system.
    UserController
    UserController manages requests related to user operations within the webshop.
    UserService
    UserService manages user accounts within the webshop.
